eventScripts.script:
path = ["[.]I_PV.HistoricalDeadband"]
	value = [currentValue.value]
	system.tag.writeBlocking(path, value)
	
	path1 = ["[.]S_SP.HistoricalDeadband"]
	system.tag.writeBlocking(path1, value)
